description: Animated grid background pattern. Creates a tech-modern aesthetic with optional animation. Perfect for hero sections and backgrounds.
useCase: Use GridPattern for: hero section backgrounds, tech/modern themed pages, section separators, full-page backgrounds, creating depth in layouts
examples: Hero section with animated grid background

style.description: CSS styles - commonly position: absolute with inset: 0 to fill container

color.description: Grid line color (hex, rgb, or CSS color name)

rendering.note: Renders as SVG pattern with defs and rect elements

bestPractices: Use as background with position: absolute
Set lower opacity (0.3-0.5) for subtle effect
Place inside a position: relative container
Layer content above with higher z-index
